name: Memsory
description:
Ems has no idea how they arrived at this place, but they are determined to find out! Accompany them on their tiny big adventure and discover what it is they're missing exactly.

We might have hopelessly overscoped this project so we implemented only 1/3 of the game. Also, let's hope you won't have problems with the cabbages or the cursed watering can!

Contributors:

  • Coding: Aspark (Link to his Twitter!)
  • Coding: NoShell
  • Music and Sound Design: Joseph Herd (Link to his channel!)
  • Art: Ombremonde (Link to their website!)
  • Environmental & Narrative Design: Tan_Tan

Assets used:

  • BBC sound effects for nature sounds
  • FMOD for sound & music implementation
  • VIDE Editor for dialogue 
  • Farm Pack, Simple Nature Pack and LowPoly Water for assets in the gameworld
  • GoogleFont used: AnnieUseYourTelescope

Known Issues

  • You need to click an interaction key (Left-click/Z) to talk to Faren.
  • The Watering Can is a cursed object we don't know who upset it. (Go there last for your own sanity.)
  • Yes, the log can fly (but you can't).
  • You want borders? We made them but they're not safe. (Or are they?)
